page.title: 05CHURCHES OF S.E.BOLDRE
page.content: {St.Mary South Baddesley}built c.185O,C of E,6 services per month,taken by Vicar of Boldre and S.Baddesley. Average congregation 38,aged 45+.About 1O children attend the children's Church at Pilley.No choir,no Sunday School. {St.Nicholas Chapel,Pilley}Dedicated in 1965 as a memorial to N.J.Norris RN.6 services a month taken by Vicar of Boldre and S.Baddesley.Average congregation:Eucharist 15-20,mostly 60+,Evensong-25(mixed ages).Regular congregation includes worshippers from Sway and Lymington.Children's Church at St.Nicholas,4 services a month taken by 2 ladies.20-30 children,ages 3-13.Many outings arranged annually. {United Reform Church,Pilley. 1 service monthly held by Minister of U.R.C.Congregation size 20,all 60+ from Boldre,Lymington & East End.
